short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the ServiceNow Widget Editor by applying popular themes like Dracula and Omni for a unique coding experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your coding experience in Service Portal framework of ServiceNow! 

This extension allows you to customize the ServicePortal Widget Editor by applying popular dark themes like Dracula and Omni. 

Enhance code readability and make development more enjoyable by adjusting the aesthetics of your workspace. 

Install now and take your development to the next level!
